attributes.action: organise and bulid a graffiti wall in every town where anyone is aloud to spray graffiti, this would cut down amount of illgal graffiti in towns around britain and give teenagers something to do and somwhere to go, other than hanging around the streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the goverment built a legal graffiti wall in every town, where anyone is aloud to spray graffiti, it would cut down the amount of illegal graffiti in towns around britain and give teenagers something to do and somwhere to go, other than hanging around the streets.
